Simpledoc Purpose

The design goals of my program, Simpledoc, can essentially be described as an automated clerk. It's goals are to model the structure and operations of a business, and implement rules and requirements of those operations. Once the model is built, it would provide computer assistance in prompting users to complete paperwork, monitor for compliance of defined rules, and inform users when out of compliance or when action is needed. The following video goes into more info about the goals of the program and how it can help any company use their time more efficiently and increase the quality of their business.
